text: Dene wong kang mati saka sira kabeh sarta padha ninggal bojo, wajib tumrap siwadon mau nyrantekake awake (ora kena omah-omah) lawase sasi dina. Dene manawa wis rampung 'iddahe sira ora padha kapatrapan dosa jalaran anggone wong wadon mau padha memaesi awake dhewe. Dene Allah iku Maha Waspada marang barang kang sira tindakake
